summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of securities involving Deutsche Bank. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, is coordinating with Harry Beller about the details of the transfer, including account numbers and securities to be moved.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, involved in the transfer of securities.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is the sender of the email, providing details about the securities transfer to Amanda Kirby.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller are collaborating on the transfer of securities.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The document discusses a full transfer of securities to Deutsche Bank.
Harry Beller is coordinating the transfer and has provided details to Amanda Kirby.
The email was sent on September 18, 2013.
There are references to multiple attachments related to the securities transfer.
